Morphological Analysis in Image Processing

This document excerpt discusses morphological analysis techniques for image processing, including erosion, dilation, and rotation. It provides examples of applying these techniques to an input image using OpenCV library.

Key Concepts:

  • Removing noise from images
  • Morphological analysis techniques
  • Erosion and Dilation operations
  • Image rotation and flipping
image-processing morphological-analysis erosion dilation rotation
